Benefits.ben1: Helps is creating a barrier on skin due to which sunrays cannot penetrate and cause damage.It inhibits the production of melonin pigment thus giving you fairer skin.It products you against sun-burns and sun tan.
Benefits.ben2: It shields you from both the harmful ultraviolet radiations-UVA and UVB.It also has moisturizing,antioxident and anti- inflammatory properties.
Benefits.ben3: It is very helpful for smoothing skin rashes & irritation.
